name: Safe
description: By default, the safe is locked with a digital code. Your task is to collect all digital codes to solve the puzzle and when all the codes are collected then the safe will be opened to get its contents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7.0 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Any with 1Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7.0 or newer Processor: 1.7 GHz or faster Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Any with 2Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0 or newer DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
